definition: will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
Liu Bei's five great generals in Romance of the Three Kingdoms, namely: Guan Yu 關羽|关羽, Zhang Fei 張飛|张飞, Zhao Yun 趙雲|赵云, Ma Chao 馬超|马超, Huang Zhong 黃忠|黄忠

sentences.english: The Dragon and the Tiger will unite one day hopefully to make great team.
sentences.chinese: 總有一天，龍和虎將會統一併組隊在一起。

sentences.english: Iron Iliad correspondent khufu sacrifice of the news to all.
sentences.chinese: 鐵虎將通訊員老胡犧牲的消息告訴衆人。
